TRANSACTION_ID,ACCOUNT_NUMBER,CUSTOMER_NAME,TRANSACTION_DATE,TRANSACTION_AMOUNT,TRANSACTION_TYPE,MERCHANT,CATEGORY,CURRENCY,EXCHANGE_RATE,ACCOUNT_BALANCE,BRANCH_CODE,IS_FRAUD,CREDIT_SCORE,LOAN_STATUS,LOAN_AMOUNT,EMI_AMOUNT,TENURE_MONTHS,INCOME,EXPENSES,AMOUNT_IN_USD branch_code,exchange_rate,expenses,amount_in_usd,transaction_date,category,account_number,customer_name,merchant,transaction_id,currency,emi_amount,transaction_amount,loan_amount,tenure_months,income,loan_status,is_fraud,account_balance,credit_score,transaction_type from tduser.TRANSACTIONS"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.JDBCComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","dataSourceLogicalName":"","executionOption":"","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":12,"componentName":"Teradata_Transactions","tableName":"Teradata_Transactions","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[9],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT
        TRANSACTION_ID,
        ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
        CUSTOMER_NAME,
        TRANSACTION_DATE,
        TRANSACTION_AMOUNT,
        TRANSACTION_TYPE,
        MERCHANT,
        CATEGORY,
        CURRENCY,
        EXCHANGE_RATE,
        ACCOUNT_BALANCE,
        BRANCH_CODE,
        IS_FRAUD,
        CREDIT_SCORE,
        LOAN_STATUS,
        COALESCE(LOAN_AMOUNT, 0) AS LOAN_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(EMI_AMOUNT, 0) AS EMI_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(TENURE_MONTHS, 0) AS TENURE_MONTHS,
        COALESCE(INCOME, 0) AS INCOME,
        COALESCE(EXPENSES, 0) AS EXPENSES,
        COALESCE(AMOUNT_IN_USD, 0) AS AMOUNT_IN_USD,
        
        CASE
            WHEN IS_FRAUD = 1 THEN 'FRAUD'
            ELSE 'LEGIT'
        END AS FRAUD_LABEL,
        
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND(LOAN_AMOUNT / INCOME, 4)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS LOAN_TO_INCOME_RATIO,
        
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND((EMI_AMOUNT * TENURE_MONTHS) / INCOME * 100, 2)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS EMI_PCT_OF_INCOME,
        
        CASE
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE >= 750 THEN 'Excellent'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 650 AND 749 THEN 'Good'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 550 AND 649 THEN 'Fair'
            ELSE 'Poor'
        END AS CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY,
        
        CASE
            WHEN EXPENSES > INCOME THEN 'Overspending'
            ELSE 'Within Budget'
        END AS SPENDING_FLAG

    FROM teradata
) t
WHERE
    t.SPENDING_FLAG = 'Overspending'
    AND t.CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY != 'Poor';
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"partitionOptions":{"partitionType":"","name":""},"easyQueryDefJson":{"sqlQuery":""},"componentId":11,"componentName":"Oracle_Transactions","tableName":"Oracle_Transactions","category":"Processor","componentType":"SQL","rank":0,"dataSourceName":"","displayRows":50,"dependencies":[8],"options":{"dbTable":"SELECT *
FROM (
    SELECT
        TRANSACTION_ID,
        ACCOUNT_NUMBER,
        CUSTOMER_NAME,
        TRANSACTION_DATE,
        TRANSACTION_AMOUNT,
        TRANSACTION_TYPE,
        MERCHANT,
        CATEGORY,
        CURRENCY,
        EXCHANGE_RATE,
        ACCOUNT_BALANCE,
        BRANCH_CODE,
        IS_FRAUD,
        CREDIT_SCORE,
        LOAN_STATUS,
        COALESCE(LOAN_AMOUNT, 0) AS LOAN_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(EMI_AMOUNT, 0) AS EMI_AMOUNT,
        COALESCE(TENURE_MONTHS, 0) AS TENURE_MONTHS,
        COALESCE(INCOME, 0) AS INCOME,
        COALESCE(EXPENSES, 0) AS EXPENSES,
        COALESCE(AMOUNT_IN_USD, 0) AS AMOUNT_IN_USD,
        
        -- Updated logic for FRAUD_LABEL
        CASE
            WHEN UPPER(SUBSTRING(CUSTOMER_NAME, 1, 1)) = 'S' THEN
                CAST(IS_FRAUD AS STRING)
            ELSE
                CASE
                    WHEN IS_FRAUD = 1 THEN 'FRAUD'
                    ELSE 'LEGIT'
                END
        END AS FRAUD_LABEL,
        
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND(LOAN_AMOUNT / INCOME, 4)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS LOAN_TO_INCOME_RATIO,
        
        COALESCE(
            CASE
                WHEN INCOME > 0 THEN ROUND((EMI_AMOUNT * TENURE_MONTHS) / INCOME * 100, 2)
                ELSE 0
            END, 0
        ) AS EMI_PCT_OF_INCOME,
        
        CASE
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE >= 750 THEN 'Excellent'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 650 AND 749 THEN 'Good'
            WHEN CREDIT_SCORE BETWEEN 550 AND 649 THEN 'Fair'
            ELSE 'Poor'
        END AS CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY,
        
        CASE
            WHEN EXPENSES > INCOME THEN 'Overspending'
            ELSE 'Within Budget'
        END AS SPENDING_FLAG

    FROM Oracle
) t
WHERE
    t.SPENDING_FLAG = 'Overspending'
    AND t.CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY != 'Poor';
"},"className":"com.datagaps.dataflow.models.SQLComponent","isCheckpointEnabled":"N","executionOption":"allparentpassorfail","excludeNotification":"N"},{"sourceDataFrame":"Teradata_Transactions","targetDataFrame":"Oracle_Transactions","mapping":[{"sourceColumn":"TRANSACTION_ID","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"TRANSACTION_ID","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"Y","columnOrder":0},{"sourceColumn":"ACCOUNT_NUMBER","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"ACCOUNT_NUMBER","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":1},{"sourceColumn":"CUSTOMER_NAME","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"CUSTOMER_NAME","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":2},{"sourceColumn":"TRANSACTION_DATE","sourceType":"DateType","sourceDataFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","sourceTypeChange":"Y","originalSourceType":"timestamp","targetColumn":"TRANSACTION_DATE","targetType":"DateType","targetDataFormat":"yyyy-MM-dd","targetTypeChange":"Y","orginalTargetType":"timestamp","unique":"N","columnOrder":3},{"sourceColumn":"TRANSACTION_AMOUNT","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"TRANSACTION_AMOUNT","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":4},{"sourceColumn":"TRANSACTION_TYPE","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"TRANSACTION_TYPE","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":5},{"sourceColumn":"MERCHANT","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"MERCHANT","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":6},{"sourceColumn":"CATEGORY","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"CATEGORY","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":7},{"sourceColumn":"CURRENCY","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"CURRENCY","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":8},{"sourceColumn":"EXCHANGE_RATE","sourceType":"decimal(9,4)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(9,4)","targetColumn":"EXCHANGE_RATE","targetType":"decimal(9,4)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(9,4)","unique":"N","columnOrder":9},{"sourceColumn":"ACCOUNT_BALANCE","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"ACCOUNT_BALANCE","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":10},{"sourceColumn":"BRANCH_CODE","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"BRANCH_CODE","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":11},{"sourceColumn":"IS_FRAUD","sourceType":"integer","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"integer","targetColumn":"IS_FRAUD","targetType":"decimal(1,0)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(1,0)","unique":"N","columnOrder":12},{"sourceColumn":"CREDIT_SCORE","sourceType":"integer","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"integer","targetColumn":"CREDIT_SCORE","targetType":"decimal(5,0)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(5,0)","unique":"N","columnOrder":13},{"sourceColumn":"LOAN_STATUS","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"LOAN_STATUS","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":14},{"sourceColumn":"LOAN_AMOUNT","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"LOAN_AMOUNT","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":15},{"sourceColumn":"EMI_AMOUNT","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"EMI_AMOUNT","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":16},{"sourceColumn":"TENURE_MONTHS","sourceType":"integer","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"integer","targetColumn":"TENURE_MONTHS","targetType":"decimal(10,0)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(10,0)","unique":"N","columnOrder":17},{"sourceColumn":"INCOME","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"INCOME","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":18},{"sourceColumn":"EXPENSES","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"EXPENSES","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":19},{"sourceColumn":"AMOUNT_IN_USD","sourceType":"decimal(18,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(18,2)","targetColumn":"AMOUNT_IN_USD","targetType":"decimal(18,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(18,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":20},{"sourceColumn":"FRAUD_LABEL","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"FRAUD_LABEL","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":21},{"sourceColumn":"LOAN_TO_INCOME_RATIO","sourceType":"decimal(23,4)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(23,4)","targetColumn":"LOAN_TO_INCOME_RATIO","targetType":"decimal(23,4)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(23,4)","unique":"N","columnOrder":22},{"sourceColumn":"EMI_PCT_OF_INCOME","sourceType":"decimal(35,2)","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"decimal(35,2)","targetColumn":"EMI_PCT_OF_INCOME","targetType":"decimal(31,2)","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"decimal(31,2)","unique":"N","columnOrder":23},{"sourceColumn":"CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"CREDIT_SCORE_CATEGORY","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","unique":"N","columnOrder":24},{"sourceColumn":"SPENDING_FLAG","sourceType":"string","sourceDataFormat":"","sourceTypeChange":"N","originalSourceType":"string","targetColumn":"SPENDING_FLAG","targetType":"string","targetDataFormat":"","targetTypeChange":"N","orginalTargetType":"string","un
